items.title: Neil Gaiman Officially Taken to Court for…Very Bad Stuff.
items.description: Gaiman sued, McFadden considered, and blurbs deprecated. All in today's book news.

items.title: Publishers, Authors Guild, and More File Lawsuit Against Idaho’s Discriminatory Book Banning Bill
items.description: Plaintiffs claim that Idaho's HB 710, implemented last summer, violates First and Fourteenth Amendment rights.

items.title: This Year’s Rainbow Book List Highlights the Best in LGBTQ+ Youth Books
